name: HELNEGAR (free demo)
description:
Welcome to HELNEGAR. An ancient evil magic is threatening the mortal races, a reborn hero is needed to stop it. . Choose your hero and face loads of enemies and dangerous bosses. Explore all the hiden places for treasures and get the best equipement to complete your mission. Level up and learn powerful spells. An action RPG with high quality 3D graphics awaits you.

• 3 characters with unique stories 

• 60 levels (6 chapters) 

• Arena colisseum 

• High quality full 3D graphics 

• Amazing boss fights 

• Different armor and weapon tiers to equip

• 4 languages (English, Spanish, French, German) 

Requeriments:
  • OS: Android 4.4 or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1,5 GB available space (installation could temporarily require more space)
Installation notes:
  • If you have already the free version installed  or other edition of the game, select overwrite  when you install this version. All your current data will remain, and the new features will be added.
  • Warning: If you install a lower edition of your current one you will lose the unique features (such as pet shop or extra pets, coins and diamonds will remain), to have them back just install again the higher edition.
